entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of rain mixed with snow beginning before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain mixed with snow in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
